name: DuckCycle2000
description:
Produce the glorious plastic ducks as fast as possible despite frequent machine breakdowns !

Controls:

  • Move: ZQSD or WASD
  • Repair: E (hold)

Programs used:

  • Godot
  • Clip Studio Paint
  • Git

The Team:

  • Graphics and animations: Hypoflyse, Pitivie
  • Development: Pitivie, Tenshi Arakawa, Vylma

Music from Pixabay
